tags.description: Google One Tap integration API endpoints for client-side configuration.

get.description: Get the Google One Tap configuration for client-side integration.

post.summary: Verify Google One Tap ID Token and generate magic link
post.description: Verify the Google One Tap ID Token, check if the user exists, and generate a magic link for authentication. If the user exists, generates a login magic link; otherwise, generates a registration magic link.

idToken.description: The Google ID Token from Google One Tap

200.description: The ID Token was verified successfully and one-time token was generated.

oneTimeToken.description: The generated one-time token for authentication

isNewUser.description: Whether this is a new user (registration) or existing user (login)

email.description: The verified email address from the Google ID Token

204.description: No content for OPTIONS preflight requests

400.description: Invalid ID Token, unverified email, or other validation errors

403.description: Access forbidden, either due to CORS restrictions or feature not enabled
